你的结论具有高度争议性。

vocabulary.meaning: genuine; legal; see also 盗版

vocabulary.meaning: to confirm (sth to be true); to verify

vocabulary.meaning: inside; among; in the midst of (doing sth); during

vocabulary.meaning: to spend; to pay out; expenses; expenditure
to control; to dominate; to allocate
to implement; to carry out; to execute; to run

vocabulary.meaning: to work a shift; on duty
sentences: 我正在值班。

vocabulary.meaning: only; merely; nothing but; no more than; it's just that ...
sentences: 他只不过是有点小聪明。

vocabulary.meaning: to see (the same thing) over and over again; to see, to one's surprise, (sth happen suddenly)

vocabulary.meaning: (production) target; quota; index; indicator; sign; signpost; (computing) pointer

vocabulary.meaning: to criticize; to find fault with; to denounce

vocabulary.meaning: to organize; to host (a conference or sports event)
leading; dominant; prevailing; to lead; to direct; to dominate

vocabulary.meaning: to respect; to revere; to esteem; honorable; distinguished (used on formal occasions before a term of address)

grammar.structure: 毕竟、不免、差（一）点儿、倒是、干脆、就4、居然、可2、明明、总算

grammar.name: 补语 - 趋向补语
grammar.structure:
趋向补语4 
表示时间意义（引申用法） 
（1）表示动作行为的开始：动词+上/起来（2）表示动作行为的持续：动词+下去/下来

grammar.name: 补语 - 程度补语
grammar.structure:
程度补语2： 
（1）形容词/心理动词+得+不得了/慌/厉害；（2）动词/形容词+坏/透+了

grammar.name: 补语 - 状态补语
grammar.structure:
状态补语2：动词/形容词+得+短语 
（1）动词/形容词+得+动词短语（2）动词/形容词+得+主谓短语（3）动词/形容词+得+固定短语

grammar.name: 特殊句型 - “有”字句
grammar.structure:
“有”字句3： 
（1）表示存在、具有：主语+有+着+宾语（2）表示附着：主语+动词+有+宾语

grammar.name: 特殊句型 - “把”字句
grammar.structure:
“把”字句3：表处置 
（1）主语+把+宾语+状语+动词 
（2）主语+把+宾语+一+动词 
（3）主语+把+宾语+动词+了 
（4）主语+把+宾语1+动词+宾语2

grammar.name: 特殊句型 - 连动句
grammar.structure: 连动句3：前后两个动词性词语具有因果、转折、条件关系

grammar.name: 特殊句型 - 兼语句
grammar.structure:
兼语句3 
表致使：主语+叫/令/使/让+人称代词+动词短语

grammar.name: 特殊句型 - 比较句
grammar.structure:
比较句5：（1）跟……相比 
（2）A+形容词+B+数量补语

grammar.name: 复句 - 多重复句
grammar.structure: 二重复句1：单句+复句；复句+单句
